name: Pensacola Gaspachee Salad
description: The following recipe is from the May 27 edition of our weekly recipe newsletter. To receive this newsletter in your inbox, sign up here! As you can probably deduce by its name, Pensacola Gaspachee Salad is one of the more...
recipeIngredient: 8 Crown Pilot crackers (one sleeve, 4.6 ounces) or 5 ounces hardtack
2 cucumbers, peeled, seeded, and diced 1/4 inch
1 green bell pepper, seeded, membrane removes, and diced 1/4 inch

recipeInstructions.text: Soak crackers in water for about 1 hour, until completely soft. Squeeze dry. There should be about 1 cup.
Mix crackers, mayonnaise, vinegar, and pepper together. Toss with celery, cucumbers, tomatoes, bell peppers, and onion and serve well chilled on lettuce.
